LanguageData.MeleeDPS.label: melee DPS
LanguageData.MeleeDPS.description: Average damage per second in melee combat. This stat ignores target defenses like dodging and armor.
LanguageData.MeleeHitChance.label: melee hit chance
LanguageData.MeleeHitChance.description: Chance to hit a target in melee. The target can still dodge even if we would've hit.
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChance.label: melee dodge chance
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChance.description: Chance to dodge a melee attack that would've otherwise hit. Characters will not dodge while aiming or firing a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.label: shooting accuracy
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.description: Base chance to not miss per cell of shot distance. Chance to hit is also affected by many other factors. A hit chance explanation for any shot can be seen by selecting a shooter and mousing over a target.
LanguageData.AimingDelayFactor.label: aiming time
LanguageData.AimingDelayFactor.description: How long it takes to shoot after choosing a target.
